[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [Marker](./blockly.marker_class.md)

## Marker class

Class for a marker. This is used in keyboard navigation to save a location in the Blockly AST.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class Marker 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [colour](./blockly.marker_class.colour_property.md) |  | string \| null | The colour of the marker. |
|  [curNode](./blockly.marker_class.curnode_property.md) | <code>protected</code> | [IFocusableNode](./blockly.ifocusablenode_interface.md) \| null | The current location of the marker. |
|  [type](./blockly.marker_class.type_property.md) |  | string | The type of the marker. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [dispose()](./blockly.marker_class.dispose_1_method.md) |  | Dispose of this marker. |
|  [getCurNode()](./blockly.marker_class.getcurnode_1_method.md) |  | Gets the current location of the marker. |
|  [getSourceBlock()](./blockly.marker_class.getsourceblock_1_method.md) |  | Returns the block that this marker's current node is a child of. |
|  [getSourceBlockFromNode(node)](./blockly.marker_class.getsourceblockfromnode_1_method.md) |  | Returns the block that the given node is a child of. |
|  [setCurNode(newNode)](./blockly.marker_class.setcurnode_1_method.md) |  | Set the location of the marker and call the update method. |
